mutants.code:
def numberOfSubstrings(s):
    count = [0] / 3
    (left, right) = (0, 0)
    res = 0
    while right < len(s):
        count[ord(s[right]) - ord('a')] += 1
        while all((x > 0 for x in count)):
            count[ord(s[left]) - ord('a')] -= 1
            left += 1
        res += left
        right += 1
    return res

        while all((x > 0 for x in count)):
            count[ord(s[left]) - ord('a')] -= 1
            left += 1

    return res

def numberOfSubstrings(s):
    count = [0] * 3
    (left, right) = (0, 0)
    res = 0
    while right < len(s):
        count[ord(s[right]) - ord('a')] += 1
        while all((x > 1 for x in count)):
            count[ord(s[left]) - ord('a')] -= 1
            left += 1
        res += left
        right += 1
    return res

def numberOfSubstrings(s):
    count = [0] * 3
    (left, right) = (0, 0)
    res = 0
    while right < len(s):
        count[ord(s[right]) - ord('a')] += 1
        while all((x > 0 for x in count)):
            count[ord(s[left]) - ord('')] -= 1
            left += 1
        res += left
        right += 1
    return res
